channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 观看：美国股市收盘下跌，因为预计将公布一份重要的通胀报告，该报告可能会极大地影响人们对美联储决定何时降息的预期
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks ended lower in anticipation of a crucial inflation report that could significantly shape expectations regarding the Federal Reserve's decision on the timing of an interest rate cut https://t.co/Tchrle6dGY pic.twitter.com/KWljwmRRYt

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 比特币的疯狂活动使其有望创下三年多来的最大月涨幅，而且由于现金涌入上市比特币基金推动了比特币的全面反弹，比特币也有望创下历史新高。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Frenetic activity in bitcoin put it on course for its biggest monthly gain in more than three years and it is within range of a record high as cash rushing to listed bitcoin funds propels a sweeping rally. More here: https://t.co/BbD4bYa4oN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 在南非物流问题频发的情况下，时装零售商正加紧本地生产，试图利用其他海港和空运来缓解港口拥堵造成的大量库存交付延误。更多信息
item.description:
Amid South Africa's logistics problems, fashion retailers are ramping up local production as they try to use alternative seaports and air freight to mitigate the impact of congestion at ports that has caused massive delays in stock deliveries. Read more: https://t.co/icPqg1gst1 pic.twitter.com/tYcMtCRk7p

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度信实公司与迪斯尼公司的合并吸引了信实公司老板穆克什-安巴尼的妻子妮塔-安巴尼重返主流商业领域，担任新公司的董事长，她在艺术和体育领域的经验以及与宝莱坞的联系将派上用场。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The Reliance-Disney India merger has attracted Nita Ambani, wife of Reliance boss Mukesh Ambani, back into mainstream business as the new company's chair, where her experience in arts and sports, and ties with Bollywood could come in handy. More here: https://t.co/KRUy7IVcQU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 巴西 PagBank 预计 2024 年净收入将加速增长
item.description:
Brazil's PagBank sees net income growth accelerating in 2024 https://t.co/i3MICp1qse pic.twitter.com/KpVrf5JFts

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁去年的年度亏损减少了一半以上。随着 Valkyrie 车型和其他特别版汽车的交付，这家英国豪华汽车制造商的销售价格达到了创纪录的水平。
item.description:
Aston Martin's annual losses more than halved last year. The British luxury carmaker saw selling prices reach record levels as it delivered its Valkyrie models and other special edition cars https://t.co/630a3D2xio pic.twitter.com/lwsJg2ZLAm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 印度顶级企业集团信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）和华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney）宣布合并其在印度的电视和流媒体资产，从而创建了一个价值 85 亿美元的娱乐巨头，远远领先于世界上人口最多国家的竞争对手。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
India's top conglomerate Reliance Industries and Walt Disney announced the merger of their India TV and streaming media assets, creating an $8.5 billion entertainment juggernaut far ahead of rivals in the world's most populous nation. More here: https://t.co/5p2FGiSq6B

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 具有环保和社会意识的购物者、员工和业务伙伴都在寻求雄心勃勃的 ESG 目标，并希望公司记录进展情况，而监管机构和投资者则会仔细审查 ESG 报表的准确性。这往往会导致 "掩盖绿色
item.description:
Environmentally and socially minded shoppers, employees and business partners seek ambitious ESG goals and want companies to document progress, while regulators and investors scrutinize ESG statements for accuracy. This often results in ‘greenhushing’ https://t.co/88XAewglvH pic.twitter.com/4ZTFTEAYLR

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚星空娱乐公司中期利润超出预期，股价大涨
item.description:
Australia's Star Entertainment beats interim profit estimate, shares jump https://t.co/DgtTmIhrWa pic.twitter.com/DnQC5O4TAb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 受制造业不振和消费疲软的影响，印度 10 月至 12 月的经济增长率可能在本财年首次低于 7%。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
India's economic growth probably slipped below 7% for the first time in the current fiscal year in the October-December period, hit by a tepid manufacturing sector and weakness in consumption. More here: https://t.co/3JnZ2mb7YF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会将于 3 月 6 日就是否通过要求美国上市公司报告气候相关风险的规则进行投票，该机构在一份通知中表示，这可能是对美国信息披露规则的一次重大改革。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The Securities and Exchange Commission will vote on March 6 on whether to adopt rules requiring US-listed companies to report climate-related risks, the agency said in a notice, in a potentially major overhaul of US disclosure rules. More here: https://t.co/7i4md1Vzts

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 日本央行高田呼吁全面改革超宽松货币政策
item.description:
BOJ's Takata calls for overhaul of ultra-loose monetary policy https://t.co/Xpfl6It8k3 pic.twitter.com/ljWUcRre2Z

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）在公司年度股东大会上表示，苹果公司计划在今年晚些时候披露更多有关人工智能应用的信息。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Apple plans to disclose more about its plans to put generative artificial intelligence to use later this year, Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook said during the company's annual shareholder meeting. More here: https://t.co/qQuk7ubT5A

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国联邦航空管理局局长表示，波音公司必须在90天内制定一项全面计划，以解决 "系统性质量控制问题"。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Boeing must develop a comprehensive plan to address ‘systemic quality-control issues’ within 90 days, the head of the US Federal Aviation Administration said, after a mid-air emergency last month sparked renewed safety concerns. More here: https://t.co/Qxcr4ZQi6A

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会提出的气候报告规则有哪些内容？
item.description:
What is in the US SEC's proposed rule on climate reporting? https://t.co/pbt6MhNbAz pic.twitter.com/aBOcjJkwbj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 工会称西太平洋银行各部门裁员 132 人
item.description:
Westpac cuts 132 jobs across divisions, says trade union https://t.co/0fbAEwPUnL pic.twitter.com/VXXAHngBtn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：美国股市在一项关键的通胀数据公布前一天收盘下跌，该数据可能在很大程度上影响人们对美联储降息时机的预期。
item.description:
WATCH: US stocks closed lower a day ahead of a key inflation reading that could heavily shape expectations for the timing of an interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve https://t.co/Tchrle6Lww pic.twitter.com/IhYPe1N1Fl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：Just Eat 外卖公司预测其 2024 年核心盈利将大幅增长近 40%，超过预期，这主要得益于其英国和爱尔兰主要市场的强劲增长，以及更高的配送效率和简化的配送操作。
item.description:
WATCH: Just Eat Takeaway forecast a nearly 40% jump in its 2024 core earnings, ahead of expectations, banking on strong growth in its key British and Irish markets boosted by better delivery efficiency and simplified delivery operation https://t.co/qYzHvhNR65 pic.twitter.com/VKJKwqycCY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 通知称，美国证券交易委员会将就期待已久的气候披露规则进行表决
item.description:
US SEC to vote on long-awaited climate disclosure rule, notice says https://t.co/dZqRfOCqZ9 pic.twitter.com/htXljDcbkK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 观看：面对南非的物流问题，时装零售商正在加强本地生产，并将他们所依赖的进口商品引向不同的港口
item.description:
WATCH: Amid South Africa's logistics problems, fashion retailers are boosting local production and directing the imports on which they rely to different ports https://t.co/icPqg1gst1 pic.twitter.com/Za6fXIyIOe

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁的年度亏损在2023年减少了一半以上，超过了市场预期，因为其豪华车和特别版车型创纪录的价格帮助这家英国汽车制造商缩小了年度亏损
item.description:
WATCH: British luxury carmaker Aston Martin's annual losses more than halved in 2023, beating market expectations, as record prices for its luxury and special edition models helped the British carmaker shrink annual losses https://t.co/630a3D2xio pic.twitter.com/GPikXlZjVb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 巴西 PagBank 第四季度利润增长 20%，得益于冠捷的增长
item.description:
Brazil's PagBank posts 20% increase in fourth quarter profit on TPV growth https://t.co/eC5o5i9jFA pic.twitter.com/qbqtV35HDJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 观看：Bumble 季度营收预期不佳，凸显了该公司需要对约会应用体验进行改革，以吸引寻求伴侣的新生代，之后该公司股价跌至历史最低点。
item.description:
WATCH: Bumble shares fell to an all-time low after its downbeat quarterly revenue forecast underscored the need for a revamp of the dating-app experience to attract newer generations seeking companionship https://t.co/yidSqSrXUA pic.twitter.com/V61BlyaKB0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

Australia's Star Entertainment logs 43% fall in first-half profit https://t.co/NQqTZL6BYw pic.twitter.com/OiwWSVhhdv

item.title: 观看：德国公用事业公司 Uniper 预计今年的利润将大幅下降。该公司预计调整后净利润在 7.58 亿美元至 12 亿美元之间，远低于去年创纪录的 48 亿美元。
item.description:
WATCH: German utility Uniper expects a significant fall in profit this year. The company has forecast adjusted net profit of between $758 million and $1.2 billion - well down from last year's record $4.8 billion https://t.co/Z8StP1id9T pic.twitter.com/h0THq9w5rY

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024

item.title: 世界银行将精简贷款和投资担保，年度目标为 200 亿美元
item.description:
World Bank to streamline loan, investment guarantees with $20 bln annual goal https://t.co/1qEZwdysj7 pic.twitter.com/NKI1cmZT9s

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 28, 2024
